name: Velocity Vengeance: Neo Pursuit
description:
VVNP is an arcade style game, where you play as a bounty hunter escaping merciless pursuers through the night skies. As you pass over a futuristic neon city, you are armed with a gun and must defend yourself for as long as you can. Watch out for debris from your left! Some will help you, and some will hurt. Comment your high scores! 

Controls:

Up: W

Down: S

Aim: Mouse Pointer

Shoot: Left-click
